device_id.description: Device ID which this Receiver forms part of

transport.description: Transport type accepted by the Receiver in URN format

interface_bindings.description: Binding of Receiver ingress ports to interfaces on the parent Node. Should contain a single network interface unless a redundancy mechanism such as ST.2022-7 is in use, in which case each 'leg' should have a matching interface listed.

subscription.description: Object containing the 'sender_id' currently subscribed to. Sender_id should be null on initialisation, or when connected to a non-NMOS Sender.

sender_id.description: UUID of the Sender that this Receiver is currently subscribed to

active.description: Receiver is enabled and configured with a Sender's connection parameters
